description.value:
A Motto or Title that bears the name of the Space Marine such that their enemies know who kills them. Add +10 Kill Markers to Assault Missions where the Scroll was displayed in at least one battle.

Requirements

Deathwatch Initiate may start with one appropriate Chapter Trapping. Chapter: Ultramarines

Effect: Initiated

Notes: -
description.summary: A Motto or Title that bears the name of the Space Marine such that their enemies know who kills them. Add +10 Kill Markers to Assault Missions where the Scroll was displayed in at least one battle.
